title: Sloe Gin Spritz
directions: Pour 4 ounces dry Prosecco or other sparkling white wine into an ice-filled large wine or rocks glass. Add 1 ounce sloe gin and top off with club soda. Gently stir together; garnish with blueberries and a sprig of mint.
ingredients: 4 ounces dry Prosecco or other sparkling white wine
Blueberries and a sprig of mint
